entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 7:15 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: W 15 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain after midnight. Rain along parts of the coast. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the afternoon. Rain along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
